          <title>
            <string language="hu">Afrikai elefánt</string>
            <string language="en">African elephant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Afrikanischer Elefant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éléphant africain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elefante africano</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Elefante africano</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szavannák lakója, a világ legnagyobb szárazföldi állata. Az ormányosok közé tartozik.</string>
            <string language="en">Inhabitant of savannas, biggest land-animal of the world. Belongs to the proboscidea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  ormányosok,  Afrika,  szavanna,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, placentalia, proboscidea, Africa, savanna</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einwohner von savannas, größtes Land-Tier der 
Welt. Gehört dem proboscidea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Habitant des savannas, le plus grand terre-animal
du monde. Appartient au proboscidea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habitante dos savannas, o terra-animal o mais 
grande do mundo. Pertence ao proboscidea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abitante dei savannas, terra-animale più grande 
del mondo. Appartiene al proboscidea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάτοικος των savannas, μεγαλύτερο έδαφος-ζώο του 
κόσμου. Ανήκει στο proboscidea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Habitante de savannas, el pista-animal más grande
del mundo. Pertenece al proboscidea.</string>
          </description>
